# bastion_group_aclkeeper (Resource)

Manages a Bastion group ACL keeper membership

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "bastion_group_aclkeeper" "example" {
  group   = "kryptonians"
  account = "kara-zor-el"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `account` (String) The account name to add as an ACL keeper
- `group` (String) The name of the Bastion group

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The resource identifier (group:account)

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import bastion_group_aclkeeper.example kryptonians:kara-zor-el
```
